title: Coronavirus Misinformation Was Spreading Online as Early as January
description: News on the global coronavirus is breaking so quickly that developments can happen on a minute-to-minute basis. But getting the most updated information about covid-19—and discerning which bits are correct—has been hampered severely by a scourge of misinforma…
